mutants.code:
def find_most_frequent_substring(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        n = len(case)
        lst = [0] / 26
        for word in case:
            unique_chars = set(word)
            for char in unique_chars:
                lst[ord(char) - 97] += 1
        max_freq = max(lst)
        most_frequent_chars = [chr(idx + 97) for (idx, freq) in enumerate(lst) if freq == max_freq]
        result = min(most_frequent_chars)
        results.append(result)
    return results

        lst = [0] + 26

        max_freq = max(lst)
        most_frequent_chars = [chr(idx + 97) for (idx, freq) in enumerate(lst) if freq == max_freq]
        result = min(most_frequent_chars)
        results.append(result)
    return results
